subject_template.title: Subject Template
subject_template.description: Jinja2 compatible string with email subject

body_template.title: Body Template
body_template.description: Jinja2 compatible string with email body

template_name.title: Template Name
template_name.description: One of pre-defined names of emails. Should be validated with enum

subject_template.title: Subject Template
subject_template.description: Jinja2 compatible string with email subject

body_template.title: Body Template
body_template.description: Jinja2 compatible string with email body

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: ISO 3166 2-symbols code, mandatory, DE by default

internal_id.title: Internal Id
internal_id.description: optional, string, internal 3rd party user or company ID

token.title: Token
token.description: Bearer token for further API calls

expiration_in.title: Expiration In
expiration_in.description: TC datetime or INT with seconds. Expiration timeout should be configured from configuration files

prev_page.title: Prev Page
prev_page.description: optional querystring with pagination parameters, null if there is no page

next_page.title: Next Page
next_page.description: optional querystring with pagination parameters, null if there is no page
